sense.gloss: Ninigi no Mikoto (Japanese deity; grandson of Amaterasu, great grandfather of Emperor Jimmu)
Nigihayahi, deity who married Nagasunehiko's younger sister and subsequently killed him when he opposed Emperor Jimmu
